name: Kril
description:
Kril is a game about a transgender woman shopping for clothes for her first time. It's a stealth game and a dress up game combined. The game heavily draws upon my own experiences with being trans, and is not reflective of anyone else. It is a short experience I created for my Senior Capstone at NYU. The game requires a Keyboard and Mouse to play.
